Kill Bill vol. 1 (2003)
-----------------------
"Here comes the bride."

IMDB: <a href="
http://imdb.com/title/tt0266697/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imdb.com/title/tt0266697/</a>

Audio: English

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish

Extra Materials:
- The Making of Kill Bill.
- The 5-6-7-8&#039;s.
- Tarantino Trailers.



Plot outline:
The lead character, called &#039;The Bride,&#039; was a member of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad, lead by her lover &#039;Bill.&#039; Upon realizing she was pregnant with Bill&#039;s child, &#039;The Bride&#039; decided to escape her life as a killer. She fled to Texas, met a young man, and on the day of their wedding was gunned down by an angry and jealous Bill (with the assistance of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad). Four years later, &#039;The Bride&#039; wakes from a coma, and discovers her baby is gone. She, then, decides to seek revenge upon the five people who destroyed her life and killed her baby. The saga of Kill Bill Volume I begins.



Kill Bill vol. 2 (2004)
-----------------------
"The bride is back for the final cut."

IMDB: <a href="
http://imdb.com/title/tt0378194/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imdb.com/title/tt0378194/</a>

Audio: English

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish

Extra Materials:
- The Making of Kill Bill vol. 2.
- Chingon Performance From the Kill Bill vol. 2 Premiere.
- Damoe Deleted Scene.
- Tarantino Trailers.


Plot outline:
The murderous Bride is back and she is still continuing her vengeance quest against her ex-boss, Bill, and taking aim at Bill&#039;s younger brother Budd and Elle Driver, the only survivors from the squad of assassins who betrayed her four years earlier. It&#039;s all leading up to the ultimate confrontation with Bill, the Bride&#039;s former master and the man who ordered her execution!
